name: Fighting Box Gangter 3D
description:
Fighting Box Gangter 3D is on the rampage; the angry mafia fighter attack is all about surviving in between the war. The city is full of thugs and mafia gang fighters, fight for your dignity; you are the barbarian king and defeat the mafia and angry fighters on street. Lets begin the fatal fight, feel like the metal is melted to stick with your fists of steel and iron, dodge your opponent and do not let them reach to you for a kill
Features
- Incredible realistic movements.
- Realistic physical struggle.
- Make incredible combos.
- Different ways to fight.
- Smooth and intense motion.
- Easy controller Shadow Fight game.
- Special fighting styles and sequel.
